gmd:characterSet.gmd:MD_CharacterSetCode: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: WCRP CMIP5: The LASG-CESS team FGOALS-g2 model output for the decadal1995 experiment

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
WCRP CMIP5: The LASG-CESS team FGOALS-g2 model output for the 10-year hindcast/prediction initialized in year 1995 (decadal1995) experiment. These data cover the following realms: atmos, land, landIce, ocean and seaIce; at the following frequencies: day, fx and mon. The runs included the ensemble members: r0i0p0, r1i1p1, r2i1p1 and r3i1p1.
The WCRP Coupled Model Intercomparison Project, Phase 5 (CMIP5), was a global climate model intercomparison project, coordinated by PCMDI (Program For Climate Model Diagnosis and Intercomparison) on behalf of the World Climate Research Program (WCRP) and provided input for the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) 5th Assessment Report (AR5).
The LASG-CESS team consisted of the following agencies: Institute of Atmospheric Physics (LASG) and Centre for Earth System Science (CESS).

gmd:otherConstraints.gmx:Anchor: Access to these data is available to any registered CEDA user. Please Login or Register for an account to gain access.

Use of these data is covered by the following licence: http://licences.ceda.ac.uk/image/data_access_condition/cmip5_open.pdf . When using these data you must cite them correctly using the citation given on the CEDA Data Catalogue record.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Detail and access information for the resource

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Data were produced and verified by The LASG-CESS team scientists before publication via the Earth Systems Grid Federation (ESGF) and a copy obtained by the Centre for Environmental Data Analysis (CEDA).
